processed.result:
You are given an array of $N$ qubits ($x$) and a single qubit ($y$). You need to write a program that takes these qubits and an integer $k$ as input. The program should then perform an operation that sets the value of qubit $y$ to the value of the $k$-th qubit in the array $x$. 

The program should not return any output; the only output is the state of the qubits after the operation is performed.

You need to write a program that takes a set of qubits, a target qubit, and an index. The program should then manipulate the qubits so that the target qubit reflects the value of the qubit at the given index in the set.
